project.name: coworking.de
project.description: coworking.de is a catalogue of coworking spaces all over germany. Since we're part of Coworking Cologne it was a matter of course to support the german coworking community with an application like this. Credits to w11 for the stunning design and hallenprojekt.de for the data.
project.what_we_did: We're building and maintaining this application, which has become the official directory of coworking spaces in germany
